parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID. Valid values:

*   China site (aliyun.com): cn-hangzhou
*   International site (alibabacloud.com): ap-southeast-1

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource ID. Enter a website ID or DNS record ID.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   Site: **site**
*   DNS records: **record**

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags that you want to add to the resource. You can enter up to 20 tags.
